traits_trait_additional_properties_json.description: A grab-bag object for non-validatable data.
traits_trait_additional_properties_json.title: Has additional properties

traits_trait_alignment_json.description: A property used to determine horizontal positioning of a content element relative to the elements that immediately follow it in the element sequence.
traits_trait_alignment_json.title: Alignment

traits_trait_channel_json.description: An optional list of output types for which this element should be visible
traits_trait_channel_json.title: Channel trait

traits_trait_id_json.description: A globally unique identifier of the content in the ANS repository.
traits_trait_id_json.title: Globally Unique ID trait

traits_trait_subtype_json.description: A user-defined categorization method to supplement type. In Arc, this field is reserved for organization-defined purposes, such as selecting the PageBuilder template that should be used to render a document.
traits_trait_subtype_json.title: Subtype or Template

utils_reference_json.description: This represents a reference to external content that should be denormalized

id.description: The id passed to the provider to retrieve an ANS document

provider.description: A URL that can resolve the id into an ANS element

referent_properties.description: An object for key-value pairs that should override the values of keys with the same name in the denormalized object

service.description: The type of interaction the provider expects. E.g., 'oembed'

type.description: The ANS type that the provider should return.

website.description: The website which the referenced id belongs to. Currently supported only for sections.

utils_reference_json.title: Representation of a normalized element

message.description: The human-readable message describing the restriction.

restriction_id.description: The ARC UUID of the distributor of this content. E.g., ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ.
